description: Comprehensive templates for Edge of Eternities mechanics: Spacecraft with station, Planets with station, Warp, Void, and Lander tokens. Includes color and colorless entries with large variety.

Creature:
Warp {X}W (You may cast this spell for its warp cost. If you do, exile it at the beginning of the next end step. You may cast it from exile later.)
When [SELF] enters, create {N} 1/1 [TOKEN_COLOR] [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature tokens.

Warp {X}W (You may cast this spell for its warp cost. If you do, exile it at the beginning of the next end step. You may cast it from exile later.)
When [SELF] enters, scry {N}, then draw a card.

When [SELF] enters, target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn.
Void — If a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn or a spell was warped this turn, instead put {X} +1/+1 counters on that creature.

When [SELF] enters, each opponent loses {N} life.
Void — If a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn or a spell was warped this turn, instead each opponent loses {N} life and you gain {N} life.

Warp {X}W (You may cast this spell for its warp cost. If you do, exile it at the beginning of the next end step. You may cast it from exile later.)
[KEYWORD:menace]. When [SELF] enters, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, draw {N} cards.
[KEYWORD:flying]. Whenever you warp a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on [SELF].
Void — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn or a spell was warped this turn, [SELF] gains first strike and lifelink until end of turn.
When [SELF] enters, create a tapped Lander token.
Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped to station a permanent, [SELF] deals {N} damage to each opponent.
Whenever you activate station, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever a Planet you control reaches its station threshold, put {N} +1/+1 counters on [SELF].
Instant:
Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn.
Void — If a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn or a spell was warped this turn, instead put {X} +1/+1 counters on it.

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
Void — If a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn or a spell was warped this turn, instead counter that spell.

Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Void — If a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn or a spell was warped this turn, instead exile target artifact or enchantment.
Create {N} Lander tokens.
Until end of turn, whenever you warp a spell, draw a card.
Tap up to {N} target permanents. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Target creature gains your choice of flying, vigilance, or lifelink until end of turn.
Sorcery: Search your library for up to {N} basic land cards, reveal them, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand, then shuffle.
Return target nonland permanent card with mana value {X} or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains warp {X}.

Draw {N} cards.
Void — If a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn or a spell was warped this turn, instead draw {N} cards and you may play an additional land this turn.

Deal {X} damage divided as you choose among up to {N} targets.
Void — If a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn or a spell was warped this turn, instead deal {X} damage to each of up to {N} targets.
Create {N} Lander tokens. Then you may sacrifice any number of lands. For each land sacrificed this way, search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Exile up to one target artifact or enchantment. Create a tapped Lander token.
You get an emblem with "Whenever you activate station, scry 1."
Enchantment: Whenever you warp a spell, create a 1/1 [TOKEN_COLOR] [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature token.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control a Spacecraft.
Whenever a nonland permanent leaves the battlefield, scry 1, then draw a card.
Planets you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if this Planet has {X} or more charge counters on it."
At the beginning of your end step, if you activated station this turn, create a tapped Lander token.
AuraCreature:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +{X}/+{X} and has "Whenever you warp a spell, this creature gains flying until end of turn."

Enchant creature
Void — If a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn, enchanted creature gets +{X}/+{X} instead.
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Create a Lander token. Activate only as a sorcery."

Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color. If a spell was warped this turn, add two mana of any one color instead."
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +{X}/+{X}. Whenever you activate station, attach [SELF] to up to one target creature you control.
Equipped creature has menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Lander token."
Artifact: When [SELF] enters, create {N} Lander tokens.
{T}, Sacrifice [SELF]: Add {X} mana of any one color.

[SUBTYPE:Spacecraft] Station {X} (Activate only as a sorcery. Tap an untapped creature you control: Put a number of charge counters on this Spacecraft equal to that creature's power.)
As long as [SELF] has {X} or more charge counters on it, it is a {X}/{X} artifact creature with flying and vigilance.

[SUBTYPE:Spacecraft] Station {X} (Activate only as a sorcery. Tap an untapped creature you control: Put a number of charge counters on this Spacecraft equal to that creature's power.)
As long as [SELF] has {X} or more charge counters on it, it has "Whenever this creature attacks, draw a card."

[SUBTYPE:Spacecraft] Station {X} (Activate only as a sorcery. Tap an untapped creature you control: Put a number of charge counters on this Spacecraft equal to that creature's power.)
Whenever you put one or more charge counters on [SELF], it deals {N} damage to any target.
Whenever you warp a spell, put a charge counter on [SELF]. Then if it has {X} or more charge counters on it, sacrifice it and draw three cards.
Land:
[SUBTYPE:Planet] Station {X} (Activate only as a sorcery. Tap an untapped creature you control: Put charge counters on this Planet equal to that creature's power.)
As long as [SELF] has {X} or more charge counters on it, it has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

[SUBTYPE:Planet] Station {X} (Activate only as a sorcery. Tap an untapped creature you control: Put charge counters on this Planet equal to that creature's power.)
When [SELF] reaches its station threshold, create {N} Lander tokens.

[SUBTYPE:Planet] Station {X} (Activate only as a sorcery. Tap an untapped creature you control: Put charge counters on this Planet equal to that creature's power.)
As long as [SELF] has {X} or more charge counters on it, creatures you control get +1/+0.
When [SELF] enters the battlefield, create a tapped Lander token.
{T}: Add {C}. Void — If a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn, add one mana of any color instead.

As long as [SELF] has {X} or more charge counters on it, it is a {X}/{X} artifact creature with flying and vigilance.

Crew 3
Whenever you activate station, untap [SELF].
Whenever you warp a spell, add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities of Spacecraft and Planets.
{T}: Put a charge counter on target artifact or Planet. Activate only as a sorcery.
Land:
[SUBTYPE:Planet] Station {X} (Activate only as a sorcery. Tap an untapped creature you control: Put charge counters on this Planet equal to that creature's power.)
As long as [SELF] has {X} or more charge counters on it, you may play an additional land on each of your turns.

[SUBTYPE:Planet] Station {X} (Activate only as a sorcery. Tap an untapped creature you control: Put charge counters on this Planet equal to that creature's power.)
When [SELF] reaches its station threshold, [SELF] deals {N} damage to each creature.

[SUBTYPE:Planet] Station {X} (Activate only as a sorcery. Tap an untapped creature you control: Put charge counters on this Planet equal to that creature's power.)
{T}: Add {C}. If [SELF] has {X} or more charge counters on it, add two mana of any one color instead.

notes: Spacecraft is an Artifact subtype; Planet is a Land type.
Station appears on Spacecraft and Planets and uses charge counters and thresholds.
Warp is an alternative cost with temporary ETB, then exile, then you may cast from exile later.
Void checks if a nonland permanent left the battlefield or a spell was warped this turn.
Lander tokens are artifact tokens that fetch basics tapped.
